title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 665.2 - Deductions from revenue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 665.2 - Deductions from revenue

State Regulations

Corrections of overcharges, authorized refunds of
overcollections previously credited to revenue, authorized refunds and
adjustments on account of failure in service, and other corrections shall be
charged to the revenue account previously credited with the amounts
involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
665.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
